p:
Peshawaraquinone 1 was evaluated for acute toxicity effects, and animals were classified into a saline-treated group ( n = 6) and peshawaraquinone 1-treated group. Peshawaraquinone 1 was administered at doses of 10, 25, 50, 100, and 200 mg/kg (P.O). After 30 min of these treatments, each animal was monitored carefully for any gross effect for 8 h. The mortality rate was observed for 24 h.
22
